description: '''Michael Mayer''' (born 11 December 1971) is an [[electronic musician]] from [[Cologne]], Germany. Mayer is a [[remixer]], [[disc jockey|DJ]] and [[music producer|producer]], and has released several singles on the [[Kompakt]] music label, working with founder [[Wolfgang Voigt]]. Mayer has also released music on Kompakt-related labels New Trance Atlantic and Kreisel 99.
